Name: Bamboo Cocktail (with Palo Cortado Sherry)
Ingredients: 45 ml Lustau Palo Cortado Península Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry, vinous, and best enjoyed as an aperitif.
Nutrition: One serving of Bamboo Cocktail (with Palo Cortado Sherry) contains 81 calories
